metadata.label: selectfields_Opportunity
metadata.comment: Reformats data by selecting specific columns and creating a new column representing the quarter and year of the close date.

expression.expression: concat(CAST(year(to_date(CloseDate)) AS STRING), 'Q', CAST(quarter(CloseDate) AS STRING))

metadata.label: account_join
metadata.comment: Joins two dataframes based on the "Id" and "AccountId" columns, selecting specific columns from the left dataframe and renaming them.

metadata.label: aggregate_opportunities_by_account
metadata.comment: Aggregates opportunities by account, providing information such as the number of opportunities, total amount, expected revenue, and the most recent closed quarter.

metadata.label: salesforce-Opportunity
metadata.comment: Reads Salesforce Opportunity data from a CSV file and creates a DataFrame with structured schema.

metadata.label: salesforce-Account
metadata.comment: Reads Salesforce Account data from a CSV file and creates a DataFrame with structured schema.
